biotools.summary: A meta SV caller and a computational pipeline to perform SV calling from low coverage long-read sequencing data. It integrates three aligners and three SV callers and generates two integrated call sets (sensitive/stringent) for different analysis purpose.

bioschemas.name: NextSV
bioschemas.summary: A meta SV caller and a computational pipeline to perform SV calling from low coverage long-read sequencing data. It integrates three aligners and three SV callers and generates two integrated call sets (sensitive/stringent) for different analysis purpose.
